title: Let’s Talk About The Husbands with Ryan Bailey
description:
I’m live in Houston, Dallas, Boston, Philly, and DC! Get tickets at heathermcdonald.net



Pop Culture expert Ryan Bailey is here! We discuss why Heidi Klum needs a wake-up call. Kim K had a party plan. Megan Kelly has to accept Megan Markle is the more famous Megan. Randall Emmett is being sued. Dan Schindler was a creep but not to Heather. Why was that? Lindsay Lohan wishes for a social media childhood. Then we discuss RHOBH and what our dream cast would be. Winter House is a boozy mess and more.



Get extra juice on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/juicyscoop

https://heathermcdonald.net/.



Follow Ryan Bailey at @sobaditsgoodwithryanbailey on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
